code: import{getPerson}from"../../database/peopleData";import{getRandomElement}from"../../utils";var getQuestion=function getQuestion(){var isMale=Math.floor(Math.random()*2);var personOne=getPerson(isMale).firstName;var personTwo=getPerson(!isMale).firstName;var adjectives=['funny','boring','quiet','calm','stressed','nervous','sad','happy','smart','talented','weird','normal','regular','simple','complicated'];var adjective=getRandomElement(adjectives);var prompt="".concat(personOne," is a ").concat(adjective," person. / ").concat(personTwo);var answer="".concat(personTwo," is a ").concat(adjective," person.");return{prompt:prompt,answer:answer};};export default getQuestion;
